Activity Web Page

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.A

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Whole of society

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.2.1.B

description.narrative: Country has an enabling environment in place leveraging additional resources from public and private sources for the SDGs: Institutional mechanisms

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.2.1.A

description.narrative: Country has an enabling environment in place leveraging additional resources from public and private sources for the SDGs: Policy, legal and regulatory frameworks

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.B.1

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct creation of employment in: Public sector (If YES, please provide Number of employment created)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.A.1

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Policy, legal, regulatory and institutional frameworks

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.1.3.A

description.narrative: Country has data collection/analysis mechanisms providing disaggregated data to monitor progress towards the SDGs: Conventional data collection methods (e.g. surveys)

description.narrative: Country has data collection/analysis mechanisms providing disaggregated data to monitor progress towards the SDGs: New data sources (e.g. big data)

description.narrative: Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With institutional frameworks for implementation in local and regional governments (LRGs)

description.narrative: Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With public-private partnerships at scale for accelerating catalytic LED initiatives

description.narrative: Country has national plans of action for prevention of violent extremism (PVE) under implementation
